job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout CoParsestrongppAt CoParse we are creating the future of how we read and write documents We are building the IDE for complex documents As software engineers we use sophisticated tools to read and write code It should be the same for documents The last major breakthroughs in word processing and viewer technology came in the 1990s strongIts time for a new innovatorstrongppbrppCoParse is an AI integrated document viewer and editor We apply proprietary text analysis algorithms to extract meaningful information from documents making them faster and easier to read CoParse features syntax highlighting crosslinking between definitions and clauses and autoextraction of document structure Alongside this powerful parsing engine weve developed a fullyfeatured elegant document viewer as a web and desktop appppbrppOver the past year we have been building out the CoParse viewer and gotten some amazing feedback from customers spanning top financial and legal firms Weve also attracted venture money from some of the best VCs in the US Weve built out a powerful tool that is already providing massive value to our customers and were looking for engineers that can take our product to the next levelppbrppstrongThe RolestrongppWe are looking for an early engineer to join our growing team  building new features that customers will love and evolving the product to revolutionize the reading and writing processppbrppstrongYou willstrongpulliOwn the design process of new features from the UI and UX to the technical implementationliliDevelop in ReactTypescript on the frontend and Java on the backendliliCollaborate with Product Design and Engineering to create impactful customer valueliliMentor teammates and share your technical expertise with others to build our collective knowledgeliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliA bachelors degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related fieldliliA strong background developing with React Typescript and Javalili3 years of relevant experience preferredliliA proven record of solving tough engineering problems and building beautiful productsliliA desire to build something that impacts a massive audience of people and changes the way we interact with documentsliulpbrppstrongOur TeamstrongppThe members of our team have learned a lot from working at startups as well as Amazon Bridgewater Salesforce and Palantir We are super excited to build out a team of passionate creative and caring people who want to change the world If you resonate with all of this lets talkppbrppstrongOur Benefitsstrongpulli100 health insurance coverageliliUnlimited PTOliliRemote and inoffice options as you desire we are NYC based but embrace the choice to work remotelyliul
